name: Autonomous (S.)
description:
Submission for 2020 GMTK Game Jam: 2D platformer where you can only influence player movement by placing coins. Try to beat the levels under par.

Source Code: https://github.com/vix597/autonomous

Art: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack

Audio thanks to j2h2: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLcbqnIDmLphE_7pSbnKF0A
